eventDecorators.name: AuthorizedAddressAdded
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when a delegate account's vote balance changes. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: AuthorizedAddressRemoved
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when a delegate account's vote balance changes. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: Deposit
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when a delegate account's vote balance changes. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: GrgProxySet
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when a delegate account's vote balance changes. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: InCatastrophicFailureMode
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when a delegate account's vote balance changes. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when a delegate account's vote balance changes. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: StakingProxySet
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when a delegate account's vote balance changes. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: Withdraw
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when a delegate account's vote balance changes. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Returns the balance in Grg Tokens of the `staker`.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOfGrgVault
functionDecorators.description: Returns the entire balance of Grg tokens in the vault.

functionDecorators.name: depositFrom
functionDecorators.description: Deposit an `amount` of Grg Tokens from `staker` into the vault. Note that only the Staking contract can call this. Note that this can only be called when *not* in Catastrophic Failure mode.

functionDecorators.name: enterCatastrophicFailure
functionDecorators.description: Vault enters into Catastrophic Failure Mode. *** WARNING - ONCE IN CATOSTROPHIC FAILURE MODE, YOU CAN NEVER GO BACK! *** Note that only the contract owner can call this function.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: Index of target in authorities array.

functionDecorators.name: setGrgProxy
functionDecorators.description: Sets the Grg proxy. Note that only an authorized address can call this function. Note that this can only be called when *not* in Catastrophic Failure mode.

parameterDecorators.name: _grgProxyAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the RigoBlock Grg Proxy.

functionDecorators.name: setStakingProxy
functionDecorators.description: Sets the address of the StakingProxy contract. Note that only the contract owner can call this function.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Change the owner of this contract.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawAllFrom
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw ALL Grg Tokens to `staker` from the vault. Note that this can only be called when *in* Catastrophic Failure mode.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFrom
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw an `amount` of Grg Tokens to `staker` from the vault. Note that only the Staking contract can call this. Note that this can only be called when *not* in Catastrophic Failure mode.
